original: shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu bzhi yin no //
analyzed: shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu bzhi yin no //
translated: These are the four causes of karmic obscuration.

original: rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: Subhūti, whatever purity of form that is the purity of the fruit.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Whatever purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that is the purity of the fruit.

original: khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: Whatever purity of the constituents, sense fields, and dependent origination that is the purity of the fruit.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: Whatever purity of the perfection of generosity that is the purity of the fruit.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the fruit.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of the fruit.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is the purity of the fruit.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is the purity of the fruit.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions is the purity of the result.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu @141b rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu @141b rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is the purity of the result.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions is the purity of the result.

original: mngon par shes pa drug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the six superknowledges is the purity of the result.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of all the meditative absorptions and dhāraṇī gateways is the purity of the result.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the ten bodhisattva stages is the purity of the result.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of the ten powers of the Tathāgata, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of a buddha is the purity of the result.

original: byang chub rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of enlightenment is the purity of the result.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the purity of physical forms is the purity of the result.

original: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the result is the purity of the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the transcendent perfection of wisdom is the purity of physical forms.

original: de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing mchad pa'o //🔽de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing mchad pa'o // de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the purity of form, the purity of the fruit, and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and so on is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa nyid de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa nyid de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa spyir bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa spyir bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the general teaching on purity.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni bdag rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni bdag rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the purity of the self is the purity of form, and the purity of form is the purity of the self.

original: de ltar na bdag rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med @142a * //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med @142a * //
translated: Thus, the purity of the self and the purity of form are not two and cannot be divided,

original: de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: are not broken apart, and are not cut apart.

original: de bzhin du sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the purity of a sentient being, a living being, a creature, a person, an individual, a human being, one born from Manu, one made by transformation, a creator, an experiencer, a knower, and a seer is the purity of form. The purity of form is the purity of a seer.

original: de ltar na mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of a seer and the purity of form are non-dual and indivisible, not cut off and not continuous.

original: de bzhin du mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: Similarly, the purity of a seer is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the one who sees,

original: de ltar na mthong ba po rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na mthong ba po rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: and so on up to: thus, Subhūti, the purity of the one who sees and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and not divided into two.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the purity of desire is the purity of form, and so on up to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of desire and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and not divided into two.

original: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Similarly, because of the purity of hatred and ignorance, form is pure, up to the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of hatred and ignorance and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are non-dual and indivisible, not different and not cut off.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang de ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang de ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, because of the purity of desire, hatred, and ignorance,

original: gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: form is pure, up to the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o @142b zhes bya ba ni nyan thos rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o @142b zhes bya ba ni nyan thos rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, attachment, aversion, and delusion are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure. In this there is no duality, nor is there any division. This is the purity of the afflictive obstructions of the śrāvakas.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the purity of form is the purity of the fruit.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa /
translated: Similarly, the purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the purity of the fruit.

original: de bzhin du ma rig pa'i bar du rnam par dag pas /🔽'du byed rnam par dag pa 'du byed rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma rig pa'i bar du rnam par dag pas / 'du byed rnam par dag pa 'du byed rnam par dag pas /
translated: Similarly, up to the purity of ignorance

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: is the purity of volitional factors. The purity of volitional factors is the purity of consciousness. The purity of consciousness is the purity of

original: ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of name and form is the purity of name and form.

original: skye mched drug rnam par dag pa skye mched drug rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: skye mched drug rnam par dag pa skye mched drug rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the six sense sources is the purity of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa rnam par dag pa reg pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: reg pa rnam par dag pa reg pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of contact is the purity of contact.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pa tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pa tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of sensation is the purity of sensation.

original: sred pa rnam par dag pa sred pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: sred pa rnam par dag pa sred pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of craving is the purity of craving.

original: len pa rnam par dag pa len pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: len pa rnam par dag pa len pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of grasping is the purity of grasping.

original: srid pa rnam par dag pa srid pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: srid pa rnam par dag pa srid pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of becoming is the purity of becoming.

original: skye ba rnam par dag pa skye ba rnam par dag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rga shi dang /
analyzed: skye ba rnam par dag pa skye ba rnam par dag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rga shi dang /
translated: The purity of birth is the purity of birth. The purity of old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and torment is the purity of old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and torment.

original: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and torment is the purity of

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purification of old age and death, and of sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and agitation, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, they are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: de ltar na rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa phyogs gcig pa rnam par dag pa yin no
analyzed: de ltar na rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa phyogs gcig pa rnam par dag pa yin no
translated: This is the purification of the one-sided cognitive obscurations of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of generosity is pure,🔽the perfection of morality is pure,🔽the perfection of patience is pure,🔽the perfection of effort is pure,

original: // rab 'byor gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: // rab 'byor gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: the perfection of concentration is pure,🔽the perfection of wisdom is pure,🔽the perfection of skillful means is pure,🔽the perfection of aspiration is pure,🔽the perfection of strength is pure,🔽the perfection of knowledge is pure,🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of external phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of emptiness is pure,🔽the emptiness of great extent is pure,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality is pure,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is pure,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited is pure,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is pure,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal is pure,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence is pure,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is pure,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension is pure,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal is pure,🔽the emptiness of essential nature is pure,🔽the emptiness of other phenomena is pure,🔽the emptiness of its own characteristics is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of an external object is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of an internal object is pure,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: the emptiness of the absence of an object to be appropriated is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of self is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of sentient beings is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of a life-force is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of an individual is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of a person is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of a human being is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of one who feels is pure,🔽the emptiness of the absence of

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @143a * //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @143a * //
translated: The perfection of diligence is pure, and the perfection of diligence is pure because of the purity of the perfection of patience.

original: rnam par dag pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The perfection of concentration is pure, and the perfection of concentration is pure because of the purity of the perfection of diligence.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure, and the perfection of wisdom is pure because of the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽Inner emptiness is pure, and inner emptiness is pure because of the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /🔽phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas / phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: Outer emptiness is pure, and outer emptiness is pure because of the purity of inner emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is pure, and inner and outer emptiness is pure because of the purity of outer emptiness.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: In the same way, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is pure,🔽and the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is pure because of the purity of inner and outer emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas /🔽dran pa nyid bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas / dran pa nyid bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is pure.🔽The establishment of mindfulness is pure.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pas /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pas / yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The establishment of mindfulness being pure,🔽the correct exertions are pure.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The correct exertions being pure,🔽the bases of supernatural powers are pure.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas /🔽dbang po rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas / dbang po rnam par dag pa /
translated: The bases of supernatural powers being pure,🔽the faculties are pure.

original: dbang po rnam par dag pas /🔽stobs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dbang po rnam par dag pas / stobs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The faculties being pure,🔽the powers are pure.

original: stobs rnam par dag pas /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pas / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
translated: The powers being pure,🔽the branches of awakening are pure.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas /🔽lam rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas / lam rnam par dag pa /
translated: The branches of awakening being pure,🔽the path is pure.

original: lam rnam par dag pas /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pas / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The path being pure,🔽the noble truths are pure.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas /🔽tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas / tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The noble truths being pure,🔽the immeasurables are pure.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The immeasurables being pure,

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of meditative stability,

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of meditative stability,🔽the purity of the formless meditative absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas /🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the formless meditative absorptions,🔽the purity of the eight aspects of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the eight aspects of liberation,🔽the purity of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas /🔽ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,🔽the purity of all meditative stabilities,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par dag pas /🔽gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par dag pas / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of all meditative stabilities,🔽the purity of all the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pas /🔽stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pas / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of all the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽the purity of the ten powers and the fearlessnesses,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: the purity of the ten powers and the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the aspects of correct understanding,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the individual correct knowledges

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par @143b dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par @143b dag pa /
translated: is the purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pas /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pas / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas🔽is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽Thus, the purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without two and cannot be divided into two. They are not cut off and are not different.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa gsum gyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa yin no
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa gsum gyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa yin no
translated: This is the purity of the obscurations of the three vehicles of the bodhisattvas.

original: // rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: // rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the perfection of wisdom, the purity of form, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of consciousness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of the perfection of wisdom, the purity of consciousness, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, not separable, not sundered, and not broken apart.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: Similarly, the purity of the perfection of concentration, the purity of the perfection of perseverance, the purity of the perfection of patience, the purity of the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa /🔽gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa / gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: and the purity of the perfection of giving are the purity of form.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di @144a * //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di @144a * //
translated: Thus the purity of the perfection of generosity, the purity of form, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be split.

original: la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of the perfection of giving, the purity of form, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided, are not broken apart, and are not cut apart.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the purity of form.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
translated: This is the small of the small path.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the purity of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of inner emptiness, up to the purity of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible. They are not made divisible. They are not unconnected and not cut off.🔽The purity of the aggregates, the constituents, and the sense fields,

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the dependent originations,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purity of the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, up to the distinct attributes of a buddha are the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: Thus, the aggregates, elements, sense spheres, dependent origination, perfections, factors of awakening, noble truths, immeasurables, concentrations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
translated: formless absorptions, eight liberations, nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and higher perceptions,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnam par dag pa @144b gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnam par dag pa @144b gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of all meditative stabilizations, the purity of all dhāraṇī gateways, the purity of the ten powers, the purity of the fearlessnesses, the purity of the detailed and thorough knowledges, up to the purity of the buddhadharmas—that is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of a buddha and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided, are not broken apart, and are not cut apart.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i 'bring yin no /🔽// / bam po sum cu brgyad pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i 'bring yin no / // / bam po sum cu brgyad pa /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas /🔽'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the purification of the conditioned and

original: 'dus byas rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purification of the unconditioned are the purification of the conditioned.

original: de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the purification of the conditioned and the purification of the unconditioned are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas /🔽ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa /🔽ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the purification of the past and🔽the purification of the future are the purification of the past.

original: 'das pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'das pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the future and🔽the purification of the past are the purification of the future.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas /🔽da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the past and the future🔽is the purity of the present.

original: da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa /🔽da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the present

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the past and the future.🔽Thus, the purity of the past and the future and the purity of the present🔽are not two nor divided, not broken apart, not otherwise.

original: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i chen po yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chung ngu'i chen po yin no //
translated: This is the great stage of the lesser path.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 'di ni zab po //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 'di ni zab po //
translated: “Lord, this purity is profound.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of the purity of form.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: ” Śāriputra said:

original: gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du lags /
analyzed: gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du lags /
translated: “Because of the purity of what?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Śāriputra, it is because form is pure.

original: rnam par dag pa zab po //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa zab po //
translated: Purity is profound.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zab po //🔽sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i @145a * //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zab po // sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i @145a * //
translated: Because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are pure, purity is profound.

original: khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: Because the earth element, water element, fire element, wind element, space element, and consciousness element are pure, they are profound.

original: mig dang / rnam ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: mig dang / rnam ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: Because the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind are pure, they are profound.

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: Because form, sound, smell, taste, feeling, and dharmas are pure, they are profound.

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of the perfection of generosity, morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purity of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purification of the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purification of the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purification of all the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po //
translated: It is profound because of the purification of the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽It is profound because of the purification of the bodhisattvas and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zab po zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi chung ngu yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zab po zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi chung ngu yin no //
translated: This is the medium of the medium of the path.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar gyur ba'o //
translated: “Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is illuminating.

original: bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa ni snang ba'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, it is because of complete purity that complete purity is illumination.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das gang rnam par dag pa'i slad du lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang rnam par dag pa'i slad du lags /
translated: “Lord, what is the purity of that?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, it is because of the purity of the perfection of wisdom that complete purity is illumination.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / @145b brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / @145b brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Similarly, it is because of the purity of the perfection of concentration, the purity of the perfection of perseverance, the purity of the perfection of patience, the purity of the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: and the purity of the perfection of giving that complete purity is illumination.”

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of complete purity because of the purity of inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of complete purity because of the purity of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of complete purity because of the purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of complete purity because of the purity of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of complete purity because of the purity of the noble truths, the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of complete purity because of the purity of the eight liberations and the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of complete purity because of the purity of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, as well as the purity of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of complete purity because of the purity of all the meditative absorptions and all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag ba snang ba'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag ba snang ba'o //
translated: It is the light of complete purity because of the purity of the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi 'bring yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa snang ba'o zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi 'bring yin no //
translated: The light of complete purity is the path of medium-medium.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol ba /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol ba /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, complete purity is the absence of rebirth.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Śāriputra, it is because of complete purity.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das gang la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, what is complete purity, in which there is no transference and no rebirth?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The absence of transference and rebirth in form is complete purity.

original: tshor @146a * //
analyzed: tshor @146a * //
translated: The absence of transference and rebirth in feeling

original: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The non-transference and non-linking of form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is purification.🔽Similarly, the non-transference and non-linking of , up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, is purification.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi chen po yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med cing nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam 'bring gi chen po yin no //
translated: This is the middling of the great path.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One, purification is the absence of affliction.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of the complete absence of affliction.”

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: “Blessed One, in what is there the purification that is the absence of affliction?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: gzugs rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Form is pure because it is essentially not defiled.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are pure because they are essentially not defiled.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i chung ngu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i chung ngu yin no //
translated: Similarly, up to the knowledge of all aspects is pure because it is essentially not defiled.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra said, “Blessed One, purity is not attainment and not realization.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Śāriputra, it is because there is no attainment and no realization.”

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,🔽“Blessed One, purity is not a phenomenon.”

original: bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, what is the purity of non-attainment and non-realization?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: gzugs thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, the purity of form is non-attainment and non-realization.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is non-attainment and non-realization.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i 'bring yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i 'bring yin no //
translated: In the same way, up to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is non-attainment and non-realization.” This is the medium of the great path.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One, purity is non-accomplishment.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:🔽“Śāriputra, the purity of form is non-accomplishment.

original: @146b sh'a ri'i bu shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @146b sh'a ri'i bu shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Śāriputra, it is because they are utterly unproduced.

original: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, what is pure in what is unproduced?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Śāriputra, the unproduced purity of form is pure.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The unproduced purity of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is pure.🔽In the same way, up to the unproduced purity of the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i chen po yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par ma grub pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam chen po'i chen po yin no //
translated: This is the great of the great path.

original: / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

translated: Blessed One, similarly, because the self is pure, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are pure.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs bcu dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'o //

translated: Blessed One, in the same way, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path are pure because of the purity of the self.🔽Blessed One, the noble truths, the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions are pure because of the purity of the self.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o // bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, the thirty-two major marks and the eighty minor marks of a great being are pure due to the purity of the self.🔽Blessed One, the meditative absorption of the heroic stride, the meditative absorption of the brave hero, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power and the heroic leader’s strength, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the heroic leader’s strength, and the heroic leader’s power of valor, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the heroic leader’s strength, the heroic leader’s power of valor, and the heroic leader’s power of valor that is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the heroic leader’s strength, the heroic leader’s power of valor, the heroic leader’s power of valor that is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, and the heroic leader’s power of valor that is endowed with the heroic leader’s power of valor—these meditative absorptions are pure due to the purity of the self.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du stobs bcu dang ; mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad dus ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du stobs bcu dang ; mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad dus ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, the meditative absorption of the heroic leader who moves with great speed and is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, the heroic leader’s strength, the heroic leader’s power of valor, the heroic leader’s power of valor that is endowed with the heroic leader’s power, and the heroic leader’s power of valor that is endowed with the heroic leader’s power of valor—this meditative absorption is pure due to the purity of the self.

original: / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa'o //

translated: In the same way, Lord, the fruit of the srota-āpanna, the fruit of the sakṛd-āgāmin, the fruit of the anāgāmin, and arhatship and individual enlightenment are pure because of the purity of the self.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

translated: They would be far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord:

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
translated: Well said, Subhuti, well said.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor ming las kyang chag so //
analyzed: rab 'byor ming las kyang chag so //
translated: Subhuti, they are attached to the name.

original: mtshan ma las kyang chags so //
analyzed: mtshan ma las kyang chags so //
translated: They are attached to the sign.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor chos @150a * //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor chos @150a * //
translated: And why?

original: thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti, all dharmas are signless and nameless.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming las kyang chags /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming las kyang chags /
translated: Subhuti:

original: mtshan ma las kyang chags pa lags /
analyzed: mtshan ma las kyang chags pa lags /
translated: How, O Lord, are they attached to the name, and how to the sign?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord:

original: rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Here, Subhuti, a son or daughter of good family in the Great Vehicle, who is unskilled in means, hears this perfection of wisdom being taught, and he thinks: 'The perfection of wisdom is taught in this way, and it is also practiced in this way.

original: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming dang / mtshan ma las kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ring du byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming dang / mtshan ma las kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ring du byed par 'gyur te /
translated: “Noble sons and daughters will also apprehend the perfection of wisdom from its name and sign. By apprehending it as a name and sign, they will abandon the perfection of wisdom and distance themselves from it.

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar 'gyur /
analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar 'gyur /
translated: Because they will falsely project the perfection of wisdom, they will abandon the perfection of wisdom and distance themselves from it.”

original: ring du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thabs ma yin pas ring ba yin no //
analyzed: ring du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thabs ma yin pas ring ba yin no //
translated: This is the distance due to lack of skillful means.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,
