analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams @162b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects, would not be taught as a doctrine of ‘past,’ ‘future,’ or ‘present.’

original: da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: ” This is the acquiescence of the knowledge of the dharma with regard to suffering.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:🔽“Lord, if the perfection of wisdom is not past, future, or present, how can the perfection of wisdom be the forerunner of the five perfections, and how can it be the forerunner of the emptinesses, up to the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur /
translated: Bhagavan, when the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya has attained the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood, how will he teach the Dharma?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will teach the Dharma saying, 'Form is very pure.'

original: tshor ba dang ; 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba dang ; 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will teach the Dharma saying, 'Feeling, discrimination, compositional factors, and consciousness are very pure.'

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
translated: Similarly, he will teach the Dharma saying, 'The aggregates, constituents, sense fields, dependent origination, perfections, emptinesses, factors of awakening, and noble truths🔽are very pure.'

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the dhyānas, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
translated: wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the meditative stabilizations,🔽the dhāraṇī gateways, up to the knowledge of all aspects are very pure.”

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no //
translated: That is the knowledge of the Dharma with regard to suffering.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is completely pure.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is completely pure because form is completely pure.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is completely pure because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are completely pure.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched @163a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched @163a * //
translated: In the same way, the aggregates, elements, sense fields,🔽dependent origination, perfections, emptinesses, factors of awakening, noble truths,

original: dang ; rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: dang ; rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: immeasurables, and concentrations are completely pure.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
translated: the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the clairvoyances,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects are pure,🔽the perfection of wisdom is pure.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: This is the receptivity to the subsequent knowledge with regard to suffering.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: “Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because form is pure?”

original: ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽de bzhin du phung po dang ; khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / de bzhin du phung po dang ; khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified due to the purification of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness?🔽Similarly, how is the perfection of wisdom purified due to the purification of the aggregates, the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, the perfections, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects are pure.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @163b kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @163b kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of form is the purification of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the purification of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
translated: Similarly, the aggregates, the constituents, the sense fields, the links of dependent origination, the perfections, the emptinesses, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the serial absorptions,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the ten tathāgata powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are the purification of the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha.🔽The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no //
translated: This is the subsequent knowledge with regard to suffering.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is purified because space is purified.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Lord, how is the perfection of wisdom purified because space is purified?”

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab @164a * //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab @164a * //
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, it is because space is unproduced, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified that the perfection of wisdom is purified.”

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: This is the acquiescence to the knowledge of the Dharma with regard to the origin.

original: rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is purified because space is unsoiled.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: “Lord, how is the perfection of wisdom purified because space is unsoiled?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:🔽“Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is not soiled, from form up to the knowledge of all modes.”

original: nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no //
translated: This is the dharma cognition of the origin.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is ungraspable.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: “Lord, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is ungraspable?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: Since space is ungraspable, from form up to omniscience, the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽This is the acceptance of subsequent knowledge with regard to the origin.

original: gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is free from conventions.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is free from conventions?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ;
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ;
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba
analyzed: nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba
translated: Just as the sound of an echo in space, in the same way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because, like space, from form up to the knowledge of all aspects there is no conventional expression.

original: ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no //
analyzed: ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no //
translated: This is subsequent knowledge with regard to the origin.

original: gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is inexpressible.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is inexpressible?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang @164b brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang @164b brjod du med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, in space there is nothing at all that is expressible.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because form up to the knowledge of all aspects is inexpressible.

original: gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because space is non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is non-apprehensible?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do //
translated: Subhūti, nothing is apprehended in space.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because form up to the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because all phenomena are non-arisen, non-ceased, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because all phenomena are non-arisen, non-ceased, uncontaminated, and unpurified?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because of the purity of form up to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Blessed One, if a son or daughter of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
translated: were to take up, bear in mind, read aloud, master, and properly pay attention to this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Blessed One, they would not develop eye disease.

original: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not develop ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind disease.

original: yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not have incomplete limbs.

original: lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Their body would not age or decay.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Son or daughter of good family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de @165a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de @165a * //
translated: That son or daughter of good family

original: ni mi bde ba spangs nas dus byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ni mi bde ba spangs nas dus byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: will die without pain.

original: chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Many thousands of gods will follow behind him in order to listen to the Dharma.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, and so on up to the Śuddhāvāsa gods, will follow behind him.

original: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Wherever that son or daughter of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: teaches this perfection of wisdom, there, on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days, a great gathering of gods will occur.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: That son or daughter of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: will increase much merit when teaching this perfection of wisdom.

original: bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: immeasurable, incalculable, inconceivable, incomparable merit will increase.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said:🔽“So it is, Subhūti!

original: de de bzhin te /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam /
analyzed: de de bzhin te / rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam /
translated: So it is, Subhūti!

original: bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa /
analyzed: bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa /
translated: If a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family teaches this perfection of wisdom in front of a divine assembly on the eighth,🔽fourteenth, or fifteenth day, their immeasurable,

original: grangs med pa /🔽gzhal du med pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa / gzhal du med pa /
translated: incalculable,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: inconceivable,

original: mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: incomparable merit will increase.

original: rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why is that, Subhūti?

original: 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no //
translated: Because this perfection of wisdom is a great jewel.” This is the subsequent knowledge of cessation.

original: rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, if this great precious perfection of wisdom is taught, it will liberate from the hells.

original: byol song gi skye gnas las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will liberate from the animal realm.

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will liberate from the world of Yama.

original: dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will liberate from poverty.

original: rgyal rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause birth in the great sāla tree of the kṣatriya class.

original: bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause birth in the great sāla tree of the brahmin class.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause birth in the great sāla tree of the householder class.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do //
translated: It will cause birth among the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Ābhāsvara realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Śubha­kṛtsna realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Bṛhat­phala realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Avṛha realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Atapa realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Sudarśana realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Akaniṣṭha realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Ākāśānantyāyatana realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Vijñānānantyāyatana realm.🔽It will cause birth among the gods of the Ākiñcanyāyatana realm.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do //
translated: It will cause birth among the gods of the Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana realm.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do //
translated: This perfection of wisdom gives the fruit of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong @165b ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong @165b ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do //
translated: and the fruit of once-returning, and the fruit of non-returning, and the state of a worthy one, and individual enlightenment, up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because in this perfection of wisdom the ten wholesome actions are taught in detail.

original: de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs s'a la chen bo rnams yod do //
analyzed: de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs s'a la chen bo rnams yod do //
translated: Having trained in it, there are great sāla tree-like royal families,

original: bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do //
translated: great sāla tree-like brahmin families,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do //
translated: great sāla tree-like business families,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: and there are gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, and gods of the Trayas­triṃśa realm, and gods of the Yāma realm, and gods of the Tuṣita realm, and gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm, and gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm.

original: tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmapurohita gods exist.

original: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmakāyika gods exist.🔽The Mahābrahmā gods exist.

original: 'od chung gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'od chung gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Parīttābha gods exist.🔽The Apramāṇābha gods exist.

original: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽dge chung gi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams yod do // dge chung gi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Ābhāsvara gods exist.🔽The Parīttaśubha gods exist.

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Apramāṇaśubha gods exist.

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Śubhakṛtsna gods exist.

original: sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Anabhraka gods exist.

original: bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Puṇyaprasava gods exist.

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brhatphala gods exist.

original: gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Śuddhāvāsa gods exist.🔽The Avṛha gods exist.

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽rab lta'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // rab lta'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Atapa gods exist.🔽The Sudṛśa gods exist.

original: legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do //🔽'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Sudarśana gods exist.🔽The Akaniṣṭha gods exist.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Ākāśānantyāyatana gods exist.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness exist,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of nothingness exist,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception exist,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: the fruit of entering the stream exists, the fruit of being tied to one more birth exists, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth exists,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: the fruit of arhatship exists,🔽the fruit of arhatship exists,

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: the state of a pratyekabuddha exists,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do //
translated: and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening exists.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na /
translated: If the perfection of wisdom exists,

original: bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four concentrations exist,

original: tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four immeasurables exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four formless absorptions exist,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of generosity exists,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @166a * //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @166a * //
translated: the perfection of moral discipline exists,

original: phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of patience exists,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of concentration,🔽and the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of skillful means,

original: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of aspiration,

original: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of power,

original: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: and the perfection of knowledge.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: There are the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do //
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do // phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: There is inner emptiness,🔽outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four noble truths exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do //
translated: the eight liberations exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do //
translated: the nine serial absorptions exist,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do //
translated: emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness exist,

original: mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do //
translated: the six clairvoyances exist,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilizations exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams yod do //
translated: the ten bodhisattva stages exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do //
translated: the ten tathāgata powers exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exist,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects exists,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings exist,

original: dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do //
translated: and the three jewels exist.

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do //
translated: The Buddha Jewel exists.

original: chos dkon mchog yod do //
analyzed: chos dkon mchog yod do //
translated: The Dharma Jewel exists.

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do //
translated: The Saṅgha Jewel exists.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to //🔽de bas na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to // de bas na 'di lta ste /
translated: All those dharmas are revealed in detail in this perfection of wisdom.🔽Therefore, this perfection of wisdom is called the precious perfection.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: This is the acquiescence of the knowledge of dharmas on the path.

original: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, in the precious perfection there is no dharma that is produced or

original: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /🔽rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: ceases, is defiled or purified,

original: yongs su gzung ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba'am /
translated: is taken up or

original: dor ba med do //
analyzed: dor ba med do //
translated: is rejected.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am /
translated: It is because there are no dharmas that are produced or

original: 'gag pa'am / @166b kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /🔽rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa'am / @166b kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: cease, are defiled or purified,

original: yongs su gzung ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba'am /
translated: are taken up or

original: dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do //
analyzed: dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do //
translated: are rejected.

original: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am /🔽'gag pa'am / dge ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / dge ba'am /
translated: “Subhūti, in this precious perfection of wisdom there is no dharma that arises or ceases,

original: mi dge ba'am /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: mi dge ba'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: that is wholesome or unwholesome,

original: zag pa med pa'am /🔽kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am / kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'am /
translated: that is contaminated or uncontaminated,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: that is reprehensible or irreproachable,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am /🔽'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: that is defiled or undefiled,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /🔽'dus byas pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / 'dus byas pa'am /
translated: that is mundane or supramundane,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de /
translated: that is compounded or uncompounded.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations it is thus:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is a precious perfection.” This is the Dharma knowledge of the path.

original: rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do //
translated: “Subhūti, in this precious perfection of wisdom there is no dharma that is defiled by any dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because those phenomena that would be defiled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, if you ask why,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
translated: it is because this precious perfection is undefiled.

original: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed /
translated: do not conceptualize in that way,

original: de ltar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de ltar mi dmigs te /
translated: do not apprehend in that way,

original: de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
translated: and do not proliferate in that way,🔽they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: They cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o //
translated: They see the blessed buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la /
translated: revere, and worship the lord buddhas,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and in order to bring beings to maturity and to purify a buddhafield,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
translated: they go from buddhafield to buddhafield.🔽And they will also attain the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te /
translated: This is the subsequent knowledge in regard to the path.

original: 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no // rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: These explain the path of seeing.🔽“Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom does not make any dharma visible,

original: mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it make any dharma invisible.

original: @167a * // ston par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: @167a * // ston par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not reveal.

original: mi ston par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi ston par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not not reveal.

original: ster bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: ster bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not give.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not take away.

original: skye bar byed pa ma yin /🔽'gag par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye bar byed pa ma yin / 'gag par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to arise.🔽It does not cause to cease.

original: 'chad bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'chad bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to be annihilated.

original: rtag par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rtag par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to be eternal.

original: don gcig par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: don gcig par byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to be one meaning.

original: don sna tshogs pa ma yin /🔽'ong bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: don sna tshogs pa ma yin / 'ong bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to be various meanings.🔽It does not cause to come.

original: 'gro bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to go.

original: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin /🔽rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin / rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause defilement.🔽It does not cause purification.

original: 'grib bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'grib bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to diminish.

original: 'phel bar byed pa ma yin /🔽'das par ma yin /
analyzed: 'phel bar byed pa ma yin / 'das par ma yin /
translated: It does not cause to increase.🔽It is not past.

original: ma 'ongs par ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs par ma yin /
translated: It is not future.🔽It does not cause to be present.

original: da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o //
translated: This is the first teaching in the context of the perfection of all-knowledge.

original: rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom does not cause one to go beyond the desire realm,

original: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause one to remain in it.

original: gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not cause one to go beyond the form realm,

original: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause one to remain in it.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not cause one to go beyond the formless realm,

original: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause one to remain in it.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not cause the perfection of generosity to be given,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause it to be taken away.

original: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not cause the perfections of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom, skillful means, aspiration, power, and knowledge to be given,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause them to be taken away.

original: nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause inner emptiness to be given,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it cause it to be taken away.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not cause outer emptiness to be given,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of emptiness,🔽nor does it take it away.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not give the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of that which is not rejected,🔽nor does it take it away.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not give the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of specific characteristics,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of nonexistence,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of essential nature,🔽nor does it take it away.

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am /
translated: It does not give the emptiness of nonobservation,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence,🔽nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the four noble truths,🔽nor does it take them away.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not give the eight liberations,🔽the nine serial absorptions,🔽emptiness,🔽signlessness,🔽and wishlessness,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the six sense fields,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the five eyes,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the five powers,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the seven aspects of enlightenment,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phrog par byed pa @167b ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa @167b ma yin /
translated: nor does it take it away.🔽It does not give the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽nor does it take them away.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: It does not give the four fearlessnesses,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the four kinds of detailed and accurate knowledge,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does not give the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽nor does it take them away.🔽It does

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the four kinds of intrepid confidence.🔽He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not give or take away the thirty-two major marks of a great person.🔽He does not give or take away the eighty minor marks.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not give or take away the ten strengths.🔽He does not give or take away the four fearlessnesses.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not give or take away the thirty-two major marks of a great person.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighty minor marks.🔽He does not give or take away the ten strengths.🔽He does not give or take away the four fearlessnesses.🔽He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not give or take away the thirty-two major marks of a great person.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighty minor marks.🔽He does not give or take away the ten strengths.🔽He does not give or take away the four fearlessnesses.🔽He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not give or take away the thirty-two major marks of a great person.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin ;
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin ;
translated: He does not give or take away the eighty minor marks.🔽He does not give or take away the ten strengths.🔽He does not give or take away the four fearlessnesses.🔽He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not give or take away the thirty-two major marks of a great person.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighty minor marks.🔽He does not give or take away the ten strengths.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not give or take away the four fearlessnesses.🔽He does not give or take away the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not give or take away the eighteen distinct attributes of

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am /🔽'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: does not bestow or take away the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: does not bestow or take away the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner,🔽the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, or the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste /🔽gnyis pa'o / //🔽/ bam po bzhi bcu pa /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste / gnyis pa'o / // / bam po bzhi bcu pa /
translated: This is the complete teaching from the perspective of the knowledge of the path.

original: rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /🔽'phrog par byed ba ma yin /🔽so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ster ba'am /🔽'phrog par byed pa ma yin /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /🔽'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /🔽'phrog par byed ba ma yin /🔽so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ster ba'am /🔽'phrog par byed pa ma yin /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /🔽'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: This is the second chapter, called “The Knowledge of Paths.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not bestow the qualities of the Buddha,

original: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
translated: nor does he take them away.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am /
translated: He does not bestow the conditioned element,

original: 'phrog bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phrog bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: nor does he take it away.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: Why is this?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
translated: Whether the Tathāgatas arise or not,🔽the true nature of dharmas, the dharma-constituent, and the establishment of dharmas—

original: chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: those all stand just as they are.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully awakened to that.

original: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do //🔽mngon par @168a * //🔽rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do // mngon par @168a * // rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: He has fully understood it.🔽He has fully awakened to it.

original: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo //🔽ston to // 'grel to //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to // 'grel to //
translated: Having fully awakened to it, he teaches it,🔽expounds it, reveals it,

original: rnam par 'byed do //🔽gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed do // gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: explains it,🔽makes it plain,

original: yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par ston to //
translated: and teaches it.

original: de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha phyung nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog autpala dang / ku mu da dang / punda r'i ka dang / man d'a ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha phyung nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog autpala dang / ku mu da dang / punda r'i ka dang / man d'a ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to //
translated: Then many hundreds of thousands of gods assembled in the sky above, and they cried out and scattered divine flowers of the blue lotus, the white lotus, the red lotus, and the mandārava, saying:

original: kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te /
analyzed: kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te /
translated: “Oh! By the teaching of this perfection of wisdom, many thousands of gods have given rise to the acceptance that phenomena are not produced.

original: 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo //
translated: We see that the wheel of the Dharma has been turned a second time in Jambudvīpa.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable elder Subhūti:🔽“Subhūti, this is not the turning of the wheel of the Dharma a second time.

original: gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the turning of the wheel of the Dharma a first time.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: This perfection of wisdom does not stand around for the sake of making anything go forth or not go forth.

original: de ci'i phyir zha na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zha na /
translated: And why is that?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: “Lord, this perfection of wisdom does not stand around for the sake of making anything go forth or not go forth.

original: mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags /
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags /
translated: Lord, what is that emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are empty of the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is empty of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.
